summary: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.
cast: Frank Silvera|Jamie Smith|Irene Kane|Jerry Jarrett|Mike Dana|Shaun O'Brien|Barbara Brand|David Vaughan|Alec Rubin|Ralph Roberts|Phil Stevenson|Arthur Feldman|Bill Funaro|Skippy Adelman|Ruth Sobotka|Felice Orlandi|Jack Curtis|Peggy Lobbin
keywords: railway station|woman wears a bustier|dancer|boxer|taxi dancer
title: El beso del asesino
